comment.author: 41260574@N04
comment._content: Class X Bull Moose. Rough riding they were highly disliked by their crews.

comment.author: 41373397@N07
comment._content: One former engineer was quoted in the book "The Railroaders" as saying of the Bull Mooses something to the effect of "they were going to be the wonder wagon of the world" but they proved to be "the dirtiest, meanest, rottenest locomotives ever built."
